Title: Everybody must get to work to eliminate the houseflies
Designer: Zhang Qiongzhi (张琼芝)Zhang Shijian (张世简)
Publisher: Tianjin weisheng xuanchuan jiaoyusuo (天津卫生宣传教育所)
Notes: Poster in a series of four, calling everybody to get to work to eliminate the sparrows, rats, mosquitoes and houseflies.
